welcomepage_text2: Overcome yourself, generate personalized training plan. Get your body in desirable shape
welcomepage_text3: Welcome to our web application for sports preparation! We are pleased that you've chosen to utilize our platform for creating personalized training plans and recommended meal schedules. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced athlete, our application will assist you in achieving your goals and enhancing your sports performances. Get ready for your best performance and start your journey to success right here!
footertext1: Provided information are based on relevant books and studies. Always prioritize your healts and safety when comitting to an activity. This project is not designed for people under 18 years old or pregnant women.
copyright2: This website serves as bachelor degree work and a semestral project for subject TNPW2

average_values_null: Before creating a training, it is necessery to enter average values of your performace.
average_values_null2: During your training, this value will be based on your recept performance.

how_to_get_average_values_text: In case you are a complete beginner, it is necessary to gather key information about your state before creating a training plan. You can use any app for tracking your training or a sports watch. The key data include the length of your run, the pace of the run, and in the case of a smartwatch, also your heartbeat. Choose a suitable route, ideally without busy roads and significant elevation changes, and record your run. Your training will be based on this record.
heartbeat_paragraph: For optimal benefits for your health, it is best practice to adjust the pace of running to your heart rate. Especially for beginners, the strain on an untrained heart can be very high, and running longer distances at too high a heart rate has more negative impacts on the body than benefits.
checkbox_needed: Risk of use consent is required before registration
checkbox_text: Registered user agrees with terms of use
terms_of_use: User agrees, that he/she takes in consideration all risks, connected to sport preparation, including risk of injury, or undesirable reactions of body. User accepts these risks and is always obliged to proiritize his own health and orders of doctors and health experts. This app is not suitable for people under age of 18 and pregnane women

run_text: Suitable for beginners and experienced alike. Prepare for a race ranging from 1km to a marathon. You can look forward to improving your physical fitness and enjoying great feelings from quality training.
gladiator_text: Gladiator Race is an obstacle course race designed for well-rounded, determined gladiators. Prepare to climb, wade through mud, and maybe even conquer a river. Suitable for more experienced athletes who are not afraid of new challenges.
name: Name
select_date: Select race date between 1 month to 1 year from today
